text: "Up Around the Bend" is a 1970 song by Creedence Clearwater Revival. It was taken from their fifth studio album Cosmo's Factory. It went to number 3 in the United Kingdom, Austria, Ireland and Germany, number 1 in Canada and Australia and number 4 in the United States and New Zealand. It was covered by Finnish glam metal band Hanoi Rocks in 1984. == References == Category:1970 songs Category:Creedence Clearwater Revival songs Category:Elton John songs
title: Up Around the Bend
